name: AutoPvPtop
title: AutoPvPtop edition (automatic setup of multiplayer maps)
author: BinbinHfr
description: Automatic PvP mod to help you setting up multiplayer maps, with automatic force creation and settings, random player placement proposals, starting resources allocation and a special Rebirth Technology to spice up the game ! Can work in PvP fighting mode, but also now in peace mode if you do not want to fight your neighbours...
